short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you a beautiful scrollbar by default and allows you to customize it to your liking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The default scrollbar is not very beautiful. This extension changes that by making it more minimalistic, less annoying and by result more beautiful. It also allows you to customize it to your liking and save your favorite looks for all or specific websites. You should install this extension to never look at a bad scroll bar again.
